metadata.title: CVE-2009-3606 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.description: Integer overflow in the PSOutputDev::doImageL1Sep function in Xpdf before3.02pl4, and Poppler 0.x, as used in kdegraphics KPDF, might allow remoteattackers to execute arbitrary code via a crafted PDF document thattriggers a heap-based buffer overflow.

criterions.comment: ipe package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
